refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the default character set for the database connection

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the current character set for the database connection specified by the link parameter.

refsect1.title: Return values
refsect1.para: The default character set for the current connection

example.title: Object oriented style
example.programlisting:
<?php
    /* Open a connection */
    $mysqli = new mysqli("localhost", "my_user", "my_password");
                                                                              
    /* Print current character set */
    $charset = $mysqli->character_set_name();
    printf ("Current character set is %s\n", $charset);

    $mysqli->close();
?>

example.title: Procedural style
example.programlisting:
<?php
    /* Open a connection */
    $link = mysqli_connect("localhost", "my_user", "my_password");
                                                                              
    /* Print current character set */
    $charset = mysqli_character_set_name($link);
    printf ("Current character set is %s\n",$charset);

    /* close connection */
    mysqli_close($link);
?>
